text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for December 2 – December 8 2024 include 90 Day: The Last Resort Season 2, Creature Commandos Season 1, Roadworthy Rescues Season 3, and Mini Beat Power Rockers Season 4. On December 3, 90 Day: The Last Resort Season 2 drops on HBO Max. The reality TV series features the couples who appeared on the original show 90 Day Fiance. However, all is not well between them and this is their second chance to fix their issues. Thus begins a tumultuous journey with couples putting in their efforts to save their relationship. Creature Commandos Season 1 will also be available on the streaming platform. The adult animated series resumes the dangerous but exciting journey of Amanda Waller following the events of Peacemaker Season 1. She has now organized a new team called Creature Commandos and is preparing for new missions. Also coming out on HBO Max is the third season of the reality show Roadworthy Rescues. the series focuses on the journey of Derek Bieri, who provides a stunning transformation to old and abandoned cars. However, the road to renovation requires a lot of hard work and patience. Additionally, Mini Beat Power Rockers Season 4 will be streaming on the platform. The animated series chronicles the lives of kids in a daycare center. Soon, they find their calling in music and form a band, much to the annoyance of their babysitter. New HBO Max releases for December 2 – December 8, 2024 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from December 2 – December 8, 2024. December 3 Hard Knocks: In Season with the AFC North (HBO Original) Kids Baking Championship: Frosting the Snowman (Food Network) 90 Day: The Last Resort, Season 2 (TLC) Mecum Full Throttle: Las Vegas NV 2024 90 Day: The Last Resort (Between the Sheets), Season 2 (TLC) December 5 Roadworthy Rescues, Season 3 Creature Commandos, Season 1 (Max Original) December 6 Teen Titans Go!, Season 8, Episodes 30-34 (Cartoon Network) The Official DC Podcast (Max Original) Batwheels, The Great Christmas Caper, Season 2 (Cartoon Network) Tiny Toons Looniversity: Winter In Blunderland, Season 2 (Cartoon Network) Mini Beat Power Rockers, Season 4 Mini Beat Power Rockers: A Villain’s Carol (2024) December 7 Evolve and Flex, Episode 1 Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story (HBO Original) December 8 Motortrend: Mecum Presents: The 2025 Kissimmee Preview Show A Season to Remember (OWN) Motortrend: Mecum Presents: The Steve McQueen 917K For more HBO Max content, check out Max’s 2025 trailer. Also here is the streaming platform’s Black Friday deal for this year.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for December 2 – December 8 2024 include 90 Day: The Last Resort Season 2, Creature Commandos Season 1, Roadworthy Rescues Season 3, and Mini Beat Power Rockers Season 4.

On December 3, 90 Day: The Last Resort Season 2 drops on HBO Max. The reality TV series features the couples who appeared on the original show 90 Day Fiance. However, all is not well between them and this is their second chance to fix their issues. Thus begins a tumultuous journey with couples putting in their efforts to save their relationship.

Creature Commandos Season 1 will also be available on the streaming platform. The adult animated series resumes the dangerous but exciting journey of Amanda Waller following the events of Peacemaker Season 1. She has now organized a new team called Creature Commandos and is preparing for new missions.

Also coming out on HBO Max is the third season of the reality show Roadworthy Rescues. the series focuses on the journey of Derek Bieri, who provides a stunning transformation to old and abandoned cars. However, the road to renovation requires a lot of hard work and patience.

Additionally, Mini Beat Power Rockers Season 4 will be streaming on the platform. The animated series chronicles the lives of kids in a daycare center. Soon, they find their calling in music and form a band, much to the annoyance of their babysitter.

New HBO Max releases for December 2 – December 8, 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from December 2 – December 8, 2024.

December 3

  • Hard Knocks: In Season with the AFC North (HBO Original)
  • Kids Baking Championship: Frosting the Snowman (Food Network)
  • 90 Day: The Last Resort, Season 2 (TLC)
  • Mecum Full Throttle: Las Vegas NV 2024
  • 90 Day: The Last Resort (Between the Sheets), Season 2 (TLC)

December 5

  • Roadworthy Rescues, Season 3
  • Creature Commandos, Season 1 (Max Original)

December 6

  • Teen Titans Go!, Season 8, Episodes 30-34 (Cartoon Network)
  • The Official DC Podcast (Max Original)
  • Batwheels, The Great Christmas Caper, Season 2 (Cartoon Network)
  • Tiny Toons Looniversity: Winter In Blunderland, Season 2 (Cartoon Network)
  • Mini Beat Power Rockers, Season 4
  • Mini Beat Power Rockers: A Villain’s Carol (2024)

December 7

  • Evolve and Flex, Episode 1
  • Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story (HBO Original)

December 8

  • Motortrend: Mecum Presents: The 2025 Kissimmee Preview Show
  • A Season to Remember (OWN)
  • Motortrend: Mecum Presents: The Steve McQueen 917K

For more HBO Max content, check out Max’s 2025 trailer. Also here is the streaming platform’s Black Friday deal for this year.
